Posts.Content: I am finding that exercise is helping me. Water aerobics was suggested and seems to help me with the stiffness. Stretching and Warm baths also help. I have used an onitmnet called Tiger Balm recommended by the Nurse Practitioner (Walmart has the best price). However, I'm still having the ache at night but the things mentioned help a lot. I do not want to take meds.
Posts.Title: pain after treatment
